name: Fall of Babel
description:
Mankind was never meant to reach the heavens.

Take control of characters inside the crumbling Tower of Babel! Navigate each character to the exit and to safety.

Fall of Babel is a short puzzle game made for Ludum Dare 36.

Disclaimer(s): For best visual results, download one of the executables. The web version does a funky thing with the shaders. This version of the game is pretty bare-bones, due to time constraints. I'll most likely be expanding on it in the future, as I have a lot of ideas that didn't make it in this time around.
